Text: Re VP PRC PRE RANKING TH DECEMBER Cc I am copying Steve Kean who will be facilitating this meeting in hopes that Mark can review his people and go home at a decent hour Has Susan given you the necessary information for Mark to call in If not please let me know so I can forward the details to you Steve can you confirm that Mark can provide his rankings early in the meeting Please advise Regards Michelle Beverley Ashcroft AM To Michelle CT cc Subject VP PRC PRE RANKING TH DECEMBER Good Morning Ms Hargrave I am contacting you on behalf of Mark C Schroeder regarding the VP PRC Pre Ranking meeting which is taking place on th December Susan Wimberley has kindly given me your name re the schedule pm your time is approx pm our time here in the UK hence I understand that Marks contribution to the meeting may take place at the beginning If you could come back to me to confirm this it would be most appreciated Looking forward to hearing from you in due course Regards Beverley

My SupportMr Lay It was brought up in a floor meeting this morning that you are probably receiving a lot of negative feedback Well I would like to offer my positive support I truly believe that we shall come out of this bruised but not beaten I have the utmost respect and admiration for you I know that under your leadership we shall once again be back on top Please know that you are always in our thoughts and prayers Keep fighting the good fight You have more employees behind than you know We are all committed to working harder than ever and do whatever it takes to weather this storm We shall survive Enron rocks Regards Michelle Michelle Hargrave Global Resource Mgmt email

Holiday PartyMr Lay I understand that we may not be having the holiday party I think this would be a huge mistake We have worked hard all year and recently havent had much to celebrate I know alot of women myself included who have already bought their dresses I think this could be our Enron Swan Song and go out with a bang I think what you did about your bonus was the most unselfish thing a man in your position could do I have been honored to work for a man of your caliber I hope my next CEO can live up to your very high standards Regards Michelle Michelle Hargrave Global Resource Mgmt email

Thank You Cc Dear Mr Lay Mr Skilling I cannot begin to express my gratitude to you and Enron for the I received My husband and I were devastated when our home flooded I was so proud to be an Enron employee when I heard that we had donated to the flood relief fund But when I learned that we would be eligible for as flood victims I could only burst into tears and thank God for working for such a humanitarian company I was a participant in the Fortune survey last year and rated Enron as THE best place to work for I truly believed it then and even more so now Thank you again for going above and beyond this employees expectations We are truly grateful Michelle Michelle Hargrave Global Resource Mgmt

Re Enron Year End Performance Management Process Cc Jeff a voicemail I think he is trying to do this from eHRonline You need to be out on the Intranet and type PEPCorpenroncom and it should bring up the PEP logo I told him to call me if he still had trouble Regards Michelle From Elizabeth NRON on AM To Michelle CT cc Subject Re Enron Year End Performance Management Process Can you help with this Forwarded by Elizabeth LinnellNAEnron on AM Jeff Dasovich Sent by Jeff Dasovich AM To Elizabeth nron Ginger nron cc Subject Re Enron Year End Performance Management Process Greetings I tried to log in with the information provided ID passwordWELCOME Havent been able to get in though Let me know if theres someone that youd like me to contact to get it resolved Thanks Best Jeff

Re Deferral Accesscan give you your logon ID which is P but only you can get your password Please call the Resolution Center at or email them at to confirm your password Regards Michelle Your unconfuser From Jeff NRON on AM Sent by Jeff NRON To Michelle CT cc Subject Deferral Access Hi Its me again I want to set up my bonus stock option deferral account but I dont think I have the right login ID and password Do you have those Thanks a million Signed Always confused

Re Vacation Sweet Vacation Cc My Favorite Problem Child Just kidding You truly only have hrs remaining What is confusing is the entitlement piece What that means that as of you had hrs remaining when we moved to SAP You begain the year with hrs took hrs prior to leaving you hrs After you took hrs leaving you with hrs as your balance Hope this helps Mary can you help Jeff with his deferral enrollment He apparently does not have that piece on his eHRonline He is way out in San Francisco and a really nice guy can you help him please Regards Michelle From Jeff NRON on PM Sent by Jeff NRON To Michelle CT cc Subject Vacation Sweet Vacation Hi Michelle Guess who Just went into Ehronline and noticed that under vacation it sez that Im entitled to hours of vacation and that Ive used hours leaving I think that Im actually entitled to more than hours Please tell me that I am Thanks very much Signed Desperately in need of vacation Also I clicked on deferral enrollment and bygolly if I couldnt find the election form to download Am I just clueless or is there another place that I need to look for it Thanks a million
